body.head: Guidelines on citation
body.p: Citations of Hofmeister XIX and the materials contained within it should fulfil two purposes:provide due acknowledgement of the resource, and permit readers to verify the information contained in the citation.

In the case of individual citations, the second purpose is best fulfilled by reference to the original printed document, for instance 'July 1884, p. 12'.
